medical_history.chief_complaint: Diffuse abdominal cramping, right greater than left.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms started last night, with periods of constant pain for a few hours followed by pain-free intervals. The patient has vomited once and last had a bowel movement 4 days ago.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Second trimester termination of pregnancy, first trimester spontaneous abortion without dilation and curettage (D&C). Denies abnormal pap smears or sexually transmitted infections (STIs). No significant past medical history or surgical history.
